title: New: Egyptian Hip Hop – SYH
content:
Having waited for what feels like seven years, it’s finally happened, and now all those involved can take a step back and give themselves a hearty pat on the back.

No, I’m not talking about the Olympics, but the long-awaited return of Mancunian group Egyptian Hip Hop. With superlatives being thrown at their early demo tracks, and mixed reviews of their live performances, the group disregarded the hype and quite rightfully took things at their own leisurely pace, and by the sounds of new track SYH it’s certainly been worth it. Pop music in it’s most expansive, psychedelic form, SYH is taken from their forthcoming debut LP GOOD DON’T SLEEP out 22 October on R&S Records.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
